definition: having its source in or being guided by the intellect (as distinguished from experience or emotion), an integer or a fraction
details:
adjective
- having its source in or being guided by the intellect (as distinguished from experience or emotion)
= example: having its source in or being guided by the intellect (as distinguished from experience or emotion)
- of or associated with or requiring the use of the mind
= synonyms: intellectual, noetic
- consistent with or based on or using reason
= example: consistent with or based on or using reason
- capable of being expressed as a quotient of integers
= example: capable of being expressed as a quotient of integers
noun
- an integer or a fraction
= synonyms: rational number
